reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 339/07: PUBLICATION OF POSTJUDGMENT AND PREJUDGMENT INTEREST RATES
reg_info.reg_name_text: PUBLICATION OF POSTJUDGMENT AND PREJUDGMENT INTEREST RATES

content.content: 1. (1) For the purposes of subsection 127 (2) of the Act, the Deputy Attorney General’s designate shall publish tables showing the determined prejudgment and postjudgment interest rates on the Ministry of the Attorney General’s website. O. Reg. 339/07, s. 1 (1). (2) The designate shall indicate on each table the date on which it was published. O. Reg. 339/07, s. 1 (2). (3) A table that is published in accordance with this section may be removed from the website on or after the day on which its successor is published, but the designate shall ensure that every table that is removed remains readily available to the public. O. Reg. 339/07, s. 1 (3).
content.raw_html:
1. (1) For the purposes of subsection 127 (2) of the Act, the Deputy Attorney General’s designate shall publish tables showing the determined prejudgment and postjudgment interest rates on the Ministry of the Attorney General’s website. O. Reg. 339/07, s. 1 (1).

(2) The designate shall indicate on each table the date on which it was published. O. Reg. 339/07, s. 1 (2).

(3) A table that is published in accordance with this section may be removed from the website on or after the day on which its successor is published, but the designate shall ensure that every table that is removed remains readily available to the public. O. Reg. 339/07, s. 1 (3).

content.content: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation). O. Reg. 339/07, s. 2. Français
content.raw_html:
2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation). O. Reg. 339/07, s. 2.
